title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including data sources (specify APIs or direct database access), sentiment analysis techniques (explicitly state if machine learning algorithms are to be used), user roles and permissions (admin, standard user, read-only user etc.), reporting and visualization needs (type of reports, dashboard requirements), integration with existing systems (specify systems like CRM, HRMS, social media platforms), and define the data retention policy.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data ingestion pipeline, sentiment analysis engine, data storage, and user interface components.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and development tools.

title: Implement Data Ingestion Pipeline
description: Develop the data ingestion pipeline to collect and preprocess data from various sources, such as customer feedback, employee surveys, and social media.

title: Develop Sentiment Analysis Engine
description: Implement the sentiment analysis engine using natural language processing (NLP) techniques and machine learning models.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the SentimentAnalysisHub platform, including dashboards, reports, and configuration interfaces.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for storing and retrieving sentiment analysis data and reports.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures and access controls to ensure data privacy and protect the system from unauthorized access.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the SentimentAnalysisHub platform, covering installation, configuration, and usage.

title: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Establish a testing and quality assurance process, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the system's reliability and correctness.
